name: Startender
description:
GitHub repository URL 

https://github.com/David-Ray-dev/GameOff2020

Theme interpretation 

In Startender, you take the role of a bartender on the moon. You work at the shady Moonshot bar, where aliens of one shape and size come to get drinks after long days at work. It is your job to serve them what they want, but be careful—your boss hasn't been paying his protection fees lately, and the Moon Mafia is coming to collect.

Can you balance preparing drinks and fighting off the mob, while saving up enough money to visit your lonely grandma?
